sqlMap.statement: SELECT CLT_CUST_TP_CD ,CLT_CUST_TP_DESC_TXT FROM ( SELECT CCT.CLT_CUST_TP_CD ,CCT.CLT_CUST_TP_DESC_TXT FROM CLT_CUST_TP CCT WHERE CCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY CCT.CLT_CUST_TP_SORT_NUM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#

SELECT CSRCT.CLT_STRGY_CD FROM CLT_STRGY_RELN_CUST_TP CSRCT WHERE CSRCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND CSRCT.CLT_STRGY_CD <> #cltStrgyCd# AND CSRCT.CLT_CUST_TP_CD = #cltCustTpCd# AND CSRCT.CLT_OVER_DUE_RANGE_LOW_AMT <= #cltOverDueRangeHighAmt# AND CSRCT.CLT_OVER_DUE_RANGE_HIGH_AMT >= #cltOverDueRangeLowAmt# AND CSRCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1
